symptoms.name: Watery diarrhea
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Abdominal pain
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Nausea
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe

lab_values.blood_culture: Positive for V. vulnificus in severe cases
lab_values.stool_culture: Positive for V. vulnificus in some cases
lab_values.wound_culture: Positive for V. vulnificus in wound infections

risk_factors: Consumption of contaminated seafood (especially raw oysters)
Open wound exposure to contaminated seawater

required: Symptoms consistent with V. vulnificus infection (e.g., diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills, skin lesions)
Positive culture for V. vulnificus from blood, stool, or wound
supportive: History of consumption of raw or undercooked seafood, especially oysters
